name: Magic Pic: The Exodus
description:
Magic Pig finally meets the one who was after him, after trident... Butcher forged the trident out of Spear of Destiny, a weapon that is capable of changing the reality and opening portals into different world, timelines. For some reason, an ordinary pig got it after it escaped from a farm and then turned into a humane form, without the trident, Magic Pig will lose powers and become a pig again. Butcher wants the trident back, but Magic Pig goes into run and jumps in the portal, so no one shall posses this dangerous power of a Trident.

As a player you are going to see Space and alien planet, Vikings, Frost Giants and much more.
